verses.verse: Behold, <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G4217><s%> manner <S%G4217><s%> of love <S%G26><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> has bestowed <S%G1325><s%> on us, that we should be called <S%G2564><s%> the sons <S%G5043><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> knows <S%G1097><s%> us not, because <S%G3754><s%> it knew <S%G1097><s%> him not.

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> are we the sons <S%G5043><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and it does not yet <S%G3768><s%> appear <S%G5319><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> we shall be: but we know <S%G1492><s%> that, when <S%G1437><s%> he shall appear, <S%G5319><s%> we shall be like <S%G3664><s%> him; for we shall see <S%G3700><s%> him as he is.
And every <S%G3956><s%> man that has <S%G2192><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> in him purifies <S%G48><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> even <S%G2531><s%> as he is pure. <S%G53><s%>

Whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> commits <S%G4160><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> transgresses <S%G458><s%> <S%G4160><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the law: <S%G4160><s%> <S%G458><s%> for sin <S%G266><s%> is the transgression <S%G458><s%> of the law. <S%G4160><s%> <S%G458><s%>
And you know <S%G1492><s%> that he was manifested <S%G5319><s%> to take <S%G142><s%> away our sins; <S%G266><s%> and in him is no <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3756><s%> sin. <S%G266><s%>

Whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> stays <S%G3306><s%> in him sins <S%G264><s%> not: whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> sins <S%G264><s%> has not seen <S%G3708><s%> him, neither <S%G3761><s%> known <S%G1097><s%> him.

Little <S%G5040><s%> children, <S%G5040><s%> let no <S%G3367><s%> man <S%G3367><s%> deceive <S%G4105><s%> you: he that does <S%G4160><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> is righteous, <S%G1342><s%> even <S%G2531><s%> as he is righteous. <S%G1342><s%>

He that commits <S%G4160><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> is of the devil; <S%G1228><s%> for the devil <S%G1228><s%> sins <S%G264><s%> from the beginning. <S%G746><s%> For this <S%G5124><s%> purpose the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> was manifested, <S%G5319><s%> that he might destroy <S%G3089><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of the devil. <S%G1228><s%>

Whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> is born <S%G1080><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> does not commit <S%G4160><s%> sin; <S%G266><s%> for his seed <S%G4690><s%> remains <S%G3306><s%> in him: and he cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> sin, <S%G264><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he is born <S%G1080><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

In this <S%G5129><s%> the children <S%G5043><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> are manifest, <S%G5318><s%> and the children <S%G5043><s%> of the devil: <S%G1228><s%> whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> does <S%G4160><s%> not righteousness <S%G1343><s%> is not of God, <S%G2316><s%> neither he that loves <S%G25><s%> not his brother. <S%G80><s%>
For this <S%G846><s%> is the message <S%G31><s%> that you heard <S%G191><s%> from the beginning, <S%G746><s%> that we should love <S%G25><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>

Not as Cain, <S%G2535><s%> who was of that wicked <S%G4190><s%> one, and slew <S%G4969><s%> his brother. <S%G80><s%> And why <S%G5484><s%> <S%G5101><s%> slew <S%G4969><s%> he him? Because <S%G3754><s%> his own works <S%G2041><s%> were evil, <S%G4190><s%> and his brother's <S%G80><s%> righteous. <S%G1342><s%>
Marvel <S%G2296><s%> not, my brothers, <S%G80><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> hate <S%G3404><s%> you.

We know <S%G1492><s%> that we have passed <S%G3327><s%> from death <S%G2288><s%> to life, <S%G2222><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> we love <S%G25><s%> the brothers. <S%G80><s%> He that loves <S%G25><s%> not his brother <S%G80><s%> stays <S%G3306><s%> in death. <S%G2288><s%>

Whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> hates <S%G3404><s%> his brother <S%G80><s%> is a murderer: <S%G443><s%> and you know <S%G1492><s%> that no <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3756><s%> murderer <S%G443><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> abiding <S%G3306><s%> in him.

Hereby <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5129><s%> perceive <S%G1097><s%> we the love <S%G26><s%> of God, because <S%G3754><s%> he laid <S%G5087><s%> down his life <S%G5590><s%> for us: and we ought <S%G3784><s%> to lay <S%G5087><s%> down our lives <S%G5590><s%> for the brothers. <S%G80><s%>

But whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> world's <S%G2889><s%> good, <S%G979><s%> and sees <S%G2334><s%> his brother <S%G80><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> need, <S%G5532><s%> and shuts <S%G2808><s%> up his bowels <S%G4698><s%> of compassion from him, how <S%G4459><s%> dwells <S%G3306><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in him?
My little <S%G5040><s%> children, <S%G5040><s%> let us not love <S%G25><s%> in word, <S%G3056><s%> neither <S%G3366><s%> in tongue; <S%G1100><s%> but in deed <S%G2041><s%> and in truth. <S%G225><s%>
And hereby <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5129><s%> we know <S%G1097><s%> that we are of the truth, <S%G225><s%> and shall assure <S%G3982><s%> our hearts <S%G2588><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> him.
For if <S%G1437><s%> our heart <S%G2588><s%> condemn <S%G2607><s%> us, God <S%G2316><s%> is greater <S%G3187><s%> than our heart, <S%G2588><s%> and knows <S%G1097><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things.
Beloved, <S%G27><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> our heart <S%G2588><s%> condemn <S%G2607><s%> us not, then have <S%G2192><s%> we confidence <S%G3954><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

And whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> we ask, <S%G154><s%> we receive <S%G2983><s%> of him, because <S%G3754><s%> we keep <S%G5083><s%> his commandments, <S%G1785><s%> and do <S%G4160><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> things that are pleasing <S%G701><s%> in his sight. <S%G1799><s%>

And this <S%G3778><s%> is his commandment, <S%G1785><s%> That we should believe <S%G4100><s%> on the name <S%G3686><s%> of his Son <S%G5207><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and love <S%G25><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> as he gave <S%G1325><s%> us commandment. <S%G1785><s%>

And he that keeps <S%G5083><s%> his commandments <S%G1785><s%> dwells <S%G3306><s%> in him, and he in him. And hereby <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5129><s%> we know <S%G1097><s%> that he stays <S%G3306><s%> in us, by the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he has given <S%G1325><s%> us.
